member.name: T:RedGate.Profiler.Api
member.summary: Use this class as an API for Red Gate ANTS Profiler. It controls the parts of your application to profile, and then while your application is executing, use it to take snapshots on demand. Note that you must run the application from within the ANTS Profiler UI. The methods for this class are the same as the commands that are available in the UI; however the API does not provide a ‘stop profiling’ method.

member.name: M:RedGate.Profiler.Api.Reset
member.summary: Discards the current set of results and resets the performance profiler

member.name: T:RedGate.Profiler.ProfilerNotRunningException
member.summary: If API calls are made while the process is not being profiled by ANTS Profiler, this exception will be thrown.
